title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 17 January 2017 - XWiki
content:
<woshilapin> has quit  
06:44 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:40 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:42 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:53 <vmassol> has quit  
09:09 <ImRG> has joined #xwiki  
09:37 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:37 <gdelhumeau> I really wonder if Linux is ready for desktop  
09:38 <gdelhumeau> now I have multiple screen support  
09:38 <gdelhumeau> but only if I start the computer without the external monitor  
09:44 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
09:51 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:57 <Pbas> hum my debian start with 3 monitor connected  
09:58 <Pbas> but I must use a custom xorg.conf  
09:59 <Pbas> (I have 2 video card and 3 monitor on Debian stable  
09:59 <gdelhumeau> yes of course I suppose I can tweak things  
10:00 <Pbas> yes I agree without xorg.conf, desktop with a single monitor working well (I though about my first debian: potatoes)  
10:05 <Pbas> Did you test starting your computer with your external monitor and waiting 5 mn? Because My 3rd screen light on after some minute after i started kde  
10:05 <Pbas> probably waiting some refresh signal (I don't know)

13:59 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> has joined #xwiki  
13:59 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> Sir?  
14:00 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> I am new to this org  
14:00 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> I want to contribute  
14:15 <Pbas> xwikiorg\_guest\_5: hello, here some ways to contribute: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Contributing  
14:33 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> has quit  
15:04 <evalica> has quit  
15:05 <msmeria> has quit  
15:13 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
15:17 <mflorea> tmortagne: I have a recent 9.0 SNAPSHOT and it seems the XWiki.StyleSheetExtension properties are missing. When you edit a page with such an object you get "Some objects from this page contain deprecated properties which were deleted from their respective classes."  
15:18 <mflorea> The JSX object is fine though  
15:18 <tmortagne> you have none or you have only contentType ?  
15:19 <tmortagne> I can see a mistake I did in front on me  
15:19 <tmortagne> but you should have at least contentType  
15:19 <mflorea> you're right, I have contentType  
15:19 <tmortagne> (committing when Eclipse accept to save my file)  
15:20 <tmortagne> ok so that's it  
15:20 <mflorea> only the contentType  
15:20 <tmortagne> I forgot to call super.createClass()  
15:20 <tmortagne> fixing  
15:20 <mflorea> cool, thanks  
15:31 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki
